entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Local blowing snow early this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
